intro.text: This is not an ordinary land-based casino that invites guests from all over Canada and other countries. Within the walls of Casino Moose Jaw you will find an amazing selection of games, comprehensive service, and many pleasant additional services. There is an incredible atmosphere here that attracts attention and causes an irresistible desire to return here again and again.

If this is your first acquaintance with Moose Jaw Casino, then it would be logical to start with an excursion into history. The gambling house began operating in September 2002\. Many Casino Moose Jaw reviews say that the establishment has become an important part of the development of the historical and tourist theme of the charming Canadian city. Immediately after the opening of the casino, the process of restoring the historical center of the city began actively.

Each guest will be able to spend time in the Casino Moose Jaw show lounge schedule and enjoy their favorite games thanks to the huge premises of 12 thousand square feet. At the same time, the casino closely interacts with neighboring businesses. This allows you to visit a magnificent spa and spend an unforgettable vacation in a charming city.

In 2024, a significant event took place, in honor of which a large-scale Moose Jaw Casino entertainment was organized. The casino underwent a planned reconstruction. As a result, a new gaming floor appeared, as well as an updated range of slots, a restaurant, a stage and much more. It is worth noting that the new version of the gambling house is made in the classic style of the 1920s. Therefore, an amazing atmosphere and flavor await you inside. No Casino Moose Jaw photos can convey this beauty. Therefore, the best solution would be to visit the casino in person.

Here you will find the luxurious Moose Jaw Casino restaurant, as well as the opportunity to enjoy a variety of shows and performances. To find out about them in advance, visit the Casino Moose Jaw events section of the website.

Games Available to Play: Moose Jaw Casin.text: You can enjoy a variety of gambling games, and in between visits to the Casino Moose Jaw show lounge. After the reconstruction, there are even more entertainment and unique opportunities for fans of live gambling.

The Canadian casino offers more than 800 of your favorite slot machines. All of them are located in their respective halls and several floors. There are also more than 300 slots with progressive jackpots. Bet sizes range from 1 cent to 5 Canadian dollars.
Table Games: Moose Jaw Casino Shows

Fans of casino games have access to more than 20 gaming tables, as well as 60 terminals with modern electronic table games. Here you can independently choose the range of bets. You can play baccarat, blackjack, single roulette, three-card poker and much more.
